textContent:
What would have changed in our lives if I had said enthusiastically, "I'm all in" when gil shared she was pregnant?

What would have changed in our lives if Gil had said, "I'm all in" when I shared my hopes and dreams?

Why did we not say that then? And how much of the pain now is coming from trying to be who we want individually without accepting and supporting each others needs?

What if we make that commitment now? Is it too late? Is it the right time? 

Clarity creates new choices
title: Insights
textContentHtml:
What would have changed in our lives if I had said enthusiastically, "I'm all in" when gil shared she was pregnant?


What would have changed in our lives if Gil had said, "I'm all in" when I shared my hopes and dreams?


Why did we not say that then? And how much of the pain now is coming from trying to be who we want individually without accepting and supporting each others needs?


What if we make that commitment now? Is it too late? Is it the right time? 


Clarity creates new choices
